page.title: 03RECREATION FOR ADULTS
page.content: A number of courses and clubs are run for adults, although many activities also take place in the nearby towns of Newcastle, Stoke, Hanley and Crewe. For the ladies, cake decorating and flower arranging classes meet regularly and many adults take part in Yoga and Keep Fit sessions. There is a Badminton club at Madeley Comprehensive School, and fishing at Madeley Pool. Although no restaurants are provided in Madeley, there are two pubs and one Working Men's Club providing evening entertainmen.Besides the usual sporting activities such as jogging, walking and cycling there are more unusual pursuits such as pigeon flying, ornamental fish- keeping, home brewing (beer and wine) and sword collecting. There is a Natio- nal Houswives Register, a Mothers Union and a Women's Institute.
